Dig, drift, drag, and roll your ride to wins with police on your tail, hitting each inch of the map hard by the time you reach the big end. Burn rubber in over 1,000 challenging races â€“ and thatâ€™s just the starting line. Be notorious, own the streets, and score the worldâ€™s best cars. Because one ride is never enough!
